description:
UPSC Essential+Mentorship Course for UPSC 2024

(GS Foundation to Advance - includes CSAT)

 

Coupon code: ESSENTIAL (Limited time offer!!)

 

Features

  • Complete coverage of entire UPSC Syllabus - from Foundation to Advanced level in 700+ hours

  • Personalised Mentorship

  • Weekly current affairs sessions - covering Pre+Mains aspects of current affairs.

  • Includes both Prelims and Mains Test Series with evaluation

  • Crisp value addition material 

  • 1 year course

 

Structure

  • Long Course - with detailed coverage of UPSC prelims + Mains Syllabus

  • Live-cum-recorded lectures - Access to recordings for 3 years.

  • Lecutre time: 6:30 to 8:30 PM (Monday to Sunday)

  • Access to Mentorship will be till Prelims 2024.

    • If you clear Prelims, you can access Mentorship till Mains 2024

  • Course will be conducted in 2 phases

    • Phase 1: Basics of GS, CSAT, Level 1 of answer writing

    • Phase 2: GS Advance - covers micro aspects related to UPSC Mains, mains specific topics, deep understanding of core subjects, mains answer writing (Advance level), etc.
